medium: Black chalk, brush and brown wash, highlights with brush and white lead, on faded blue paper
title: Death of Saint Peter Martyr
marks:
Inscription and Stamp

ULC and URC, in brown ink
description: two soldiers with swords held overhead attacking a kneeling figure with a halo; another haloed figure with arms upraised, fleeing, at left; other soldiers in background at right; Madonna and Child at top center in clouds, with two kneeling figures; mounted on tan paper, edged in gold
creditline: The John E. and Marion Andrus III Fund
